title: Chinese robotics outlook for 2026 includes cobot growth, competitive pressure
description:
Chinese trends in industrial robots and cobots for 2026 include growing volumes, consolidation pressures, and international expansion.

The post Chinese robotics outlook for 2026 includes cobot growth, competitive pressure appeared first on The Robot Report.
